cars.description: This is an immaculate 2006 Nissan Rogue with only 25000 miles on it. Leather seats.
This 2011 Mazda 6 has 45000 miles on it. Leather seats, missing drivers side mirror.
Although older, this celica has aged well. Runs, has all doors, no rust, 85000 miles.
This classic LeBaron has only minor rust, a missing bumper and 186000 miles.
Having seen better days, this Legacy has a dragging muffler, cracked rear axle but still runs.
